DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the effects of Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD) on daily life activities in patients with COPD and also to determine the socio-demographic profile, daily life style and needs of the patients with COPD.
DOC.brief_title: Cross-sectional Study to Investigate the Effects of Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease on Daily Life Activities
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of COPD Outpatient treatment for any reason Current or exsmoker An exacerbation of COPD that still lasts or that was experienced within last 3 months History of asthma and/or allergic rhinitis The presence of another important respiratory disease
